name: regular_dice_rolls
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dice_roll_simulator.
Tool description: Roll as many dice of any size as many times you want with the ultimate dice rolling API.
API description: This function simulates rolling a specified number of dice for a specified number of times using the Dice Roll Simulator API.

rolls.description: The number of times to roll the dice. Default is 2.

dice.description: The number of dice to roll each time. Default is 3.
